name: Pq-Central
title: Paqari-stat v1
description: Electrochemical device for potential control and current measurement. Widely used in research labs for educational applications in energy, environment, or industry.
features: Wireless electrochemical control (Bluetooth) with built-in solar power
Modular design that allows adding new experiments
Potential range: -1.5 V to +1.5 V vs Ag
purchase_context: Main device; base for complementary modules or stand-alone purchase.

name: Energy-Chem
title: Energy module
description: Module for Pq-Central to perform experiments related to energy generation and storage devices (batteries, capacitors, fuel cells).
features: Designed for energy generation and storage
purchase_context: Module that runs connected to Pq-Central or as a compact bench for quick tests.

name: Digi-Chem
title: Digital Chemistry module
description: Module to perform experiments related to digital chemistry and automated chemical reactions.
features: Maximum of 2 modules per Pq-Central unit
purchase_context: Complementary module connected to Pq-Central; can also operate individually for specific tasks.

name: Spectro
title: Visible/RGB spectrophotometer
description: Device for use as a Visible and/or RGB spectrophotometer. Quantifies solution concentrations through color and intensity analysis.
price_note: Works standalone or as a Pq-Central module
purchase_context: Can be used independently as a spectrophotometer or attached to Pq-Central.

name: Paqari-Scope
title: x40 Microscope
description: A microscope for observing small-scale samples. Allows viewing from cells to materials prepared in designed experiments: microstructures, microrobots, films, etc.
price_note: Works standalone or as a Pq-Central module
purchase_context: Compatible with Pq-Central and usable independently for observations.

name: NanoMat-Chem
title: Materials synthesis module
description: A Pq-Central module designed to convert solar energy into chemical energy, enabling the synthesis of advanced materials such as graphene, quantum dots, metallic oxides, and more.
features: Includes a low-intensity red laser pointer
purchase_context: Pq-Central module; can operate autonomously for materials synthesis.
